Key.English: If enabled, suggested rules will be visible on the map in "SerialKillers" briefing section.
Key.Polish: Jeżeli włączone, proponowane zasady będą widoczne na odprawnie na mapie w zakładce "SerialKillers".

Key.English: Cops are not allowed to use terrorist stashes/weapons. They may only use radios that find after neutralizing a terrorist.
Cops are not allowed to kill, hurt or harm civilians in any other way without certainty that this is a terrorist. They may not use civilian vehicles either.
Cops are not allowed to sit in jail nor obstruct it in any way. They may only check if a prisoner is there, without moving him, they must leave immediately afterwards.
Only 1 police helicopter is allowed, with the same dedicated crew.
Terrorists should not use any cops-dedicated functionalities within police stations.
Terrorists are responsible for everyone's fun. Make it so the police doesn't die of boredom.
Driving off-road is allowed only when having off-road vehicle. Despite that, do not hide in forests/remote areas on purpose, as it's not fun.
Using vehicles as kamikaze kinetic projectiles is strictly forbidden due to how arma works, and it's not fun anyway.
